revised_title: Observations of Solar Eclipse, Sun's Height, Latitude of Madrid, and Halos around the Moon
tldr: The Earl of Sandwich, while serving as an ambassador in Spain, made various astronomical and geographical observations, including the solar eclipse in June, the sun's height in the solstice, the latitude of Madrid, and halos around the Moon. He found the latitude of Madrid to be 40°10' which differs from previous measurements.
